Package com.jummania

Interface DataManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DataManagerImpl
public interface DataManager
Interface for managing data storage and retrieval, including primitives, objects, and collections. Provides methods to store, retrieve, and remove data, as well as register listeners for data changes.

Created by Jummania on 20, November, 2024. Email: sharifuddinjumman@gmail.com Dhaka, Bangladesh.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    DataManager.Converter
    The Converter interface provides methods for converting data between JSON format and Java objects.
    static interface 
    DataManager.OnDataChangeListener
    Interface for listeners to be notified when data changes.

  • Method Details

    • getString

      String getString(String key, String defValue)
      Retrieves a stored String value associated with the specified key. If no value is found, returns the provided default value.
      Parameters:
      key - The key for the stored value.
      defValue - The default value to return if no value is found.
      Returns:
      The stored String value or the default value.

    • getInt

      int getInt(String key, int defValue)

      defValue - The default value to return if no value is found.
      Returns:
      The stored int value or the default value.

      <T> T getObject(String key, Type type)
      Retrieves a stored object associated with the specified key.

      Parameters:

      type - The Type of the object to retrieve.
      Returns:

      rawType - The raw type of the object.

      Returns:

      Returns:
      The stored String value or null if no value is found.

    • saveList

      <T> void saveList(String key, List<T> value, int maxArraySize)
      Stores a list of objects with the specified key, limiting the size of the list.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of objects in the list.
      Parameters:
      key - The key for the stored list.
      value - The list of objects to store.
      maxArraySize - The maximum allowed size of the list.

    • fromJson

      <T> T fromJson(String value, Type typeOfT)
      Converts the provided JSON string to an object of the specified type.

      This method uses Gson to deserialize the JSON string into an object of the specified type. The type parameter allows the conversion to a specific object type.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object.
      Parameters:
      value - the JSON string to deserialize.
      typeOfT - the type of the object to deserialize into.
      Returns:
      the deserialized object of type T.
      Throws:
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - if the JSON string is not a valid representation for the specified type.

    • fromReader

      <T> T fromReader(Reader json, Type typeOfT)
      Converts a JSON stream from a Reader into a Java object of the specified type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object
      Parameters:
      json - the Reader containing the JSON data to be converted
      typeOfT - the type of the object to be returned
      Returns:
      the Java object represented by the JSON data from the Reader

    • toJson

      String toJson(Object object)
      Converts the given object to a JSON string.

      This method uses Gson to serialize an object into its JSON representation. It can handle any object type, converting it into a JSON string.

      Parameters:
      object - the object to serialize into JSON.
      Returns:
      the JSON string representation of the object.
      Throws:
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - if the object cannot be serialized.

    • remove

      void remove(String key)
      Removes the stored value associated with the specified key.
      Parameters:
      key - The key for the value to remove.

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clears all stored data.

    • contains

      boolean contains(String key)
      Checks if a value associated with the specified key exists in the storage.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to check.
      Returns:
      true if the key exists, false otherwise.

    • registerOnDataChangeListener

      void registerOnDataChangeListener(DataManager.OnDataChangeListener listener)
      Registers a listener to be notified when data associated with a key changes.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to be registered.

    • unregisterOnDataChangeListener

      void unregisterOnDataChangeListener()
      Unregisters the currently registered data change listener.
